content: took a cowl over for a friend asked her silver-haired bike-riding ultra marathon-running 100k husband if he d wear one - he just spluttered **so i asked him to try it on** - within less than a minute **he** was explaining to me in great technical detail why this was the perfect item for all of his outdoor pursuits honestly much more practical for active guys than a scarf - **if only you can get them to try ** **for snow clearing** it can be pulled up over the face **for wood-cutting** no danger of it getting caught in the chainsaw some of the guys like a closer-fit so i added a tighter guy size sizes ladies might like are included too **many thanks to the testers and their male models ☺ ** spikeysandy knitgrl xstitch paulinespinks skyhooked wireknitter unitwo symonangel with her own gift of grace handspun 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/the-long-and-winding-row
